info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API for managing medical appointments with doctors, nurses, and physiotherapists. All endpoints require JWT authentication.

post.summary: Log in and get a JWT token

post.description: Provides a new access token and a new refresh token. The current (soon to be expired) refresh token must be sent in the Authorization header.

expires_in.description: New access token lifetime in seconds

post.description: Creates a new emergency call for the authenticated user. The patient_id is automatically assigned based on the logged-in user. This endpoint does not require a request body.
